00058     footnotes,
00059     strongNumbers,
00060     headings,
00061     morphTags,

00073     bool strongNumbers;
00074     bool headings;

00081     };

00085     };
00086   enum LoadError { // the values exist to cast from the char return of SWMgr::Load

00088         NoError = 0,
00089         NoModules = 1
00090   };
